channel.title: Utility Function on On Guessing Well
channel.description: Recent content in Utility Function on On Guessing Well

item.title: Make Good Choices
item.description: Authors Note: I am “soft rebooting” my blog. I feel that my posts don’t communicate ideas well. I want this blog to be easy to understand. This post is a first attempt at a different approach. Let me know what you think. This post will introduce readers to the central theme of the blog: how can we make decisions while faced with uncertainty? I wrote this post for people who have to make decisions while faced with uncertainty (for example: anyone on any given day), but don’t yet have the tools to deal with these kinds of problems (for example: maximum expected utility).
